title: Fred's Films. Stepping South: Apollo Bay Jan 1963
brief_description:
It’s summer 1963, time to pack up the car and head to the beach. Fred Daley, steam train enthusiast and 8mm home movie maker, follows his family’s trip to the beaches of Apollo Bay, the lush rain forest of Paradise and the powerful beauty of the Twelve Apostles.
Along the way we also see Lorne, Port Campbell and Cinema Point in the Otway Ranges.
